    if [ $year -eq "0" ]; then
    elif [ $year -eq 0 ]; then

    if [ $year -eq "0" ]; then
      condition
      conditionaaaaaaaaaaaa
    elif [ $year -eq 0 ]; then
      conditionoooooooooooo

      conditionttttttttttttt

    if [ $year -ne 0 ]; then
      conditioneeeeeeeeeee
      conditionesss
    else
      conditionassss
    fi
